effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If this move successfully hits the target, any Pokémon adjacent to the target are damaged for 1/16 their max HP.

short_effect.x_y: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Deals splash damage to Pokémon next to the target.

flavor_text.x_y: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user attacks the target with a bursting flame. The bursting flame damages Pokémon next to the target as well.
